paragraphs.content: I finally got a vape :33 i do sound like my friend saying that lol. i also got a new outfit that ive been wearing alot, maybe i can add pictures to the blog :3

I got to hang out with the gang yesterday :D we didnt do much just smoked a joint and played roblox. ive been avoiding using my main account because ive been avoiding people due to a specific event i dont want to talk about. i dont really know how to deal with it but i think it can wait.

I finally started to consistently take my antidepressants (Sertraline an SSRI) but I can't see any changes in my personality or emotions. I still think about suicide for 60% of my day and it pisses me off. I've been wanting to relapse too. I've been bringing pliers and a shaving razor everywhere, its gross. I just need someone I know I can talk to about my feelings.

The one time I'm invited somewhere is the one time I try to stay off my phone. Anything good I try to do in this stupid world just backfires on me and makes me even more deppressed than before. I just want it to stop.
